channel.title: Comments on: Confirmation
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: I'm not sure if our will creates the future and then we see it, or if our future is creating us... however it goes down, I think perhaps it is reassuring to be tested...to know you're on the right track!
item.content:encoded: I’m not sure if our will creates the future and then we see it, or if our future is creating us… however it goes down, I think perhaps it is reassuring to be tested…to know you’re on the right track!
